journey.title: Software Engineer @ Aevoluta
journey.description: Complete development of software and web applications, from design, development and deployment of frontend (React) and backend (FastAPI) components with associated maintenance activities on different technology stacks.

journey.title: Backend Engineer @ Aevoluta
journey.description: Development and maintenance of backend services with FastAPI (Python) and PostgreSQL. Designing RPA systems using UiPath for the automation of complex business processes.

journey.title: Professional Certification in Computer Science
journey.description: Extensive practice in structured programming, database management, and web development. Focus on Java Spring Boot, Angular, and modern web technologies.

journey.title: Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration
journey.description: University of Cagliari - Strong foundations in Financial and Applied Mathematics, expertise in Big Data analytics for banking.
